## useEditorTheme() function

React Hook for the editor theming

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useEditorTheme(): {
  editor: EditorTheme
  editorUi: DeepPartial<EditorUiTheme>
}
```

<b>Returns:</b>

{ editor: [EditorTheme](./ui.editortheme.md)<!-- -->; editorUi:
[DeepPartial](./ui.deeppartial.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EditorUiTheme](./ui.editoruitheme.md)<!-- -->&gt;;
}

An object containing the current [editor theme](./ui.editortheme.md) and
[editor UI theme](./ui.editoruitheme.md)
